data.title: Alyson Stoner, Olivia Holt, Audrey Whitby, Kent Boyd and Damien Haas to help young talent at Celebrity Share Weekend February 2013, Pasadena, CA
data.meta_description: Many of our favorite stars will be at a convention in Pasadena, CA the first weekend in February! It's called Celebrity Share Weekend 2013 here are the details from their website: click here for the events website Feb 2,2013 9:00 am through Feb 3,2013 3:00 pm First Annual “Celebrity Share” Weekend Learning From Some Favorite…
data.text:
Many of our favorite stars will be at a convention in Pasadena, CA the first weekend in February!

It’s called Celebrity Share Weekend 2013

here are the details from their website:

click here for the events website

Feb 2,2013 9:00 am through Feb 3,2013 3:00 pm

First Annual “Celebrity Share” Weekend Learning From Some Favorite Stars and Industry Professionals Pasadena Convention Center, Pasadena, CA February 2nd and 3rd Let the “Stars” teach you the ins and outs of acting and dancing! Here’s your opportunity to learn from the people that are working on some of your favorite television shows! Some awesome celebrities that have committed to being there are: Allisyn Arm from Sunny with a Chance and So Random, Jordan Fisher from The Secret Life of The American Teenager and the upcoming Disney’s Teen Beach Movie , Olivia Holt from Kicking It and Girl vs. Monster, Audry Whitby from Sunny with a Chance, Damien Hass from So Random, and more! Learn from some of the fabulous dancers you’ve seen on So You Think You Can Dance such as Kent Boyd, also from Bun Heads, and Marco Germar, both in the upcoming Disney Movie, Teen Beach. You will also learn from Darrien Henning, choreographer for Cody Simpson. You will learn how to audition and learn the basics of how to get into film and television from former Disney Casting Director and the amazing Manager of some of the above listed talent, Lynne Marks. You will have the opportunity to do a mock audition in front of her and leave her with a copy of your headshot and resume. Learn what Agents want to see from Pamela Fisher with one of the most respected agencies in Los Angeles, Abrams Artists. Get prepared for finding an agent. Learn how to get appointments and what agents want to see. The convention will take place in Pasadena, CA on February 2nd and 3rd. One flat rate includes educational sessions from some of the above mentioned Celebrities plus a continental breakfast both days and a light lunch both days. Bring your camera! Photos and autographs will be available, as time permits. This convention is not associated with any other convention, modeling agency, talent scouts, etc. This convention is for educational purposes only with a bonus of getting to learn from some awesome celebrities that want to share their experience with you and an opportunity to meet with well respected professionals that influence the entertainment industry. We believe in the privacy act. Your information will not be sold or traded or utilized for any other purposes. Registration – Go to http://www.patthemeetingplanner.com to register. With all of this amazing talent, we are expecting a quick sell out! Get your tickets early! Space is limited! Early-Early bird registration by December 31st offers a $200 discount! Only $499! Disclaimer: All Stars and Coaches that are mentioned have agreed to participate in the convention. Each of them will make every possible effort to uphold this obligation. Keep in mind though, they are working actors and dancers. If a contractual conflict arises for any one of them, we will make every effort to replace them with a star of equal attraction and status. No Refunds. However, funds may be transferred to a future event hosted by Pat The Meeting Planner.

Early bird registration between January 1st and January 15th offers a $100 discount! Only $599! From January 16th through January 25th is our very low price of 699! If any seats are available after January 25th, you will be able to purchase tickets for $799!

Event Fees:

EARLY Early Bird Registratrion Discounted $ 499.00

Early Bird Registration $ 599.00

Celebrity Share Weekend Fees $ 699.00

Location

Pasadena Convention Center

300 E. Green Street

Pasadena, California 91101

This sounds like an awesome opportunity for young people who want to make it big!!

If you can go to this, I’m sure you’ll have an amazing time!
